name: Chunks
description: Build and share worlds, design rideable roller-coasters, or try out user created game modes and tools in this block-based VR sandbox.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7+ Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 970 Storage: 250 MB available space Additional Notes: Requires a HTC Vive
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7+ Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 970 Storage: 250 MB available space Additional Notes: Requires a HTC Vive
